alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 24 at 3:11AM MST until December 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 60 to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Otero, Eastern Las Animas, and Bent Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...These winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages may occur. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile and light weight vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of the strong winds and dry conditions will likely produce widespread areas of blowing dust across the plains. This will produce low visibility and hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
